message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 by us, reflecting its high quality and unique features. Considering its worth and the benefits it can bring to you, I am extending this exclusive opportunity for you to own it at a special introductory price of $10500. I believe this offer presents a great value for you while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
